name: clone-khome-project
description: The Link City WordPress project with custom theme

scripts.format: npm run format:web && npm run format:php
scripts.format:web: npm run format:js && npm run format:css && npm run format:html && npm run format:md
scripts.format:php: npm run format:php-code && npm run format:php-html
scripts.format:php-code: ~/.config/composer/vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --config=.php-cs-fixer.php --allow-risky=yes && echo '✅ PHP code formatted with PHP-CS-Fixer'
scripts.format:php-html: find wp-theme/link-city -name '*.php' -exec sh -c 'html-beautify -r -s 4 "$1"' _ {} \; && echo '✅ HTML in PHP files formatted with html-beautify'
scripts.format:theme: npm run format:theme:web && npm run format:theme:php
scripts.format:theme:web: prettier --write "wp-theme/link-city/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json,css,scss,md}" && echo '✅ Theme web files formatted'
scripts.format:theme:php: ~/.config/composer/vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --config=.php-cs-fixer.php --allow-risky=yes && npm run format:php-html && echo '✅ Theme PHP files formatted'

author: 1227 Team
